statements: SELECT event_id, player_id, action, item_id, game_outcome, timestamp FROM game_event_logs;
SELECT player_id, timestamp, action, game_outcome, item_id, event_id FROM game_event_logs;
SELECT action, player_id, timestamp FROM game_event_logs WHERE item_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, game_outcome FROM game_event_logs WHERE action = 'win';
SELECT * FROM game_event_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM game_event_logs WHERE game_outcome = 'Win' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_actions FROM game_event_logs GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_actions > 10
SELECT DISTINCT player_id, action FROM game_event_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_id, player_id, action, item_id, game_outcome, timestamp FROM game_event_logs ORDER BY event_id LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM game_event_logs WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND action LIKE '%Attack%'
SELECT * FROM player_actions WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, action_name FROM player_actions WHERE action_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT game_result FROM game_outcomes WHERE outcome_id = 100;
SELECT player_id, action_name, action_timestamp FROM player_actions ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM game_outcomes WHERE game_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT player_id, action_name, action_timestamp FROM player_actions
SELECT * FROM game_outcomes WHERE outcome_id = 1
SELECT game_result, game_timestamp FROM game_outcomes WHERE game_result = 'Win'
SELECT action_name, action_timestamp, player_id FROM player_actions ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM game_outcomes WHERE game_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY game_timestamp
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT player_name, item_name, item_type FROM players JOIN items ON players.player_id = items.item_id;
SELECT player_name, log_description FROM players JOIN game_logs ON players.player_id = game_logs.player_id;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, item_name FROM players JOIN items ON players.player_id = items.item_id;
SELECT player_name, log_time, log_description FROM players JOIN game_logs ON players.player_id = game_logs.player_id WHERE log_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM players JOIN game_logs ON players.player_id = game_logs.player_id GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM game_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, event_type FROM game_events WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM player_actions WHERE action_type = 'login';
SELECT player_id, game_result FROM game_outcomes WHERE game_result = 'Win' ORDER BY outcome_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT player_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'kill';
SELECT * FROM item_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, action_type FROM player_actions WHERE action_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, game_result FROM game_outcomes WHERE game_result = 'win' ORDER BY outcome_timestamp ASC;
SELECT player_name, num_games_played FROM players;
SELECT player_name, join_date FROM players ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM game_items WHERE item_type = 'weapon';
SELECT player_name, last_game_timestamp FROM players WHERE num_games_played > 100;
SELECT action_type, action_description FROM player_actions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, num_games_played FROM players WHERE num_games_played > 10 ORDER BY num_games_played DESC;
SELECT player_name, join_date FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY join_date ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, player_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM item_interactions WHERE player_id = 1001 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT game_id, winner_id, outcome_description FROM game_outcomes WHERE winner_id IS NOT NULL;
